DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to measure the antimicrobial effectiveness of ChloraPrep One-Step Frepp Applicator.
DOC.criteria: in good general health have skin within 6 inches of the test sites that is free of tattoos, dermatoses, abrasions, cuts, lesions or other skin disorders. topical or systemic antimicrobial exposure within 14 days prior to the Screen Visit
